utility package¶

Submodules¶

utility.geolocation module¶

geolocation.py module, task is to scan Wifi and return Mac Addresses in json format to be used by Google Geolocation API

class utility.geolocation.Geolocation¶

Bases: object

A class to Scan wifi

convert_to_json(information_list)¶

Takes in list of wifi information, perform regex operations to extract Mac address, channel, signal strenght and return a json object

Parameters

information_list (list) – list containing wifi information

Returns

wifi_access_point

Return type

dict

format_list(scan_result)¶

Splits scan result into 2d array and filters not human readable string

Parameters

scan_result (string) – result from sudo iwlist scanning

Returns

wifi_list

Return type

list

make_request_to_google_geo_api(payload)¶

Send payload to google geolocation api and returns json

Parameters

payload (json) – payload used for the request

Returns

coordinate

Return type

json

run()¶

Init and runs ScanWifi

scan_wifi_information()¶

Uses the command “sudo iwlist scanning” to scan for wifi
